titleStmt.title: Samuel G. Suddarth, Receipt to H. M. Woodruff
CWG13668

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 11; Bundles of AG & QMG Expenditures 1864-65; Bundle 1

body.p:
No. 22.
The State of Kentucky,
To H. M. Woodruff Dr.

row.cell: To Publishing in "Owensboro Monitor" advertisement of Qr. Master Genl. of Ky., for the recovery of State arms &c datedSeptr. 19th 1863, two insertions @ $1.50 each

body.p: I certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated; and that they were necessary for the public service.

S. G. Suddarth Q M Genl of Ky.
Quarter-Master Gen. of Ky.

Received at Frankfort, Kentucky, the 6" of February, 1864, of S. G. Suddarth, Quarter-master ^Genl^ Kentucky Volunteers, the sum of Three Dollars and -- Cents, in full of the above account.
(DUPLICATE.)

No. 22.
No 21 Abstract B N Qr. 186.
H M Woodruff
Dollars 3 -- /100
Paid 6 February, 1864.
Advertising
Printing
J226
